Uses of Class
de.vinado.boot.secrets.SecretsEnvironmentPostProcessor

    • Uses of SecretsEnvironmentPostProcessor in de.vinado.boot.secrets

      Subclasses of SecretsEnvironmentPostProcessor in de.vinado.boot.secrets 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EnvironmentConfigDataSecretsEnvironmentPostProcessor
      An environment post-processor that resolves secrets.file.properties from the application.properties file and overrides existing properties.
      class  EnvironmentSecretsPropertyEnvironmentPostProcessor
      An environment post-processor that resolves every environment variable with a _FILE suffix.
      class  FilenameConfigDataSecretsEnvironmentPostProcessor
      An environment post-processor that resolves secrets.file.properties from the application.properties file and overrides existing properties.
      class  FilenameSecretsEnvironmentPostProcessor
      An environment post-processor that resolves all files from a configurable directory.
